page.title: 08CHILDRENS' GAMES
page.content:
Children often play {GAMES}and these are some of them: hide and seek, hopscotch, bulldog, stuck in the mud and blink-murder. Many of these are traditional. Younger children tend to play with toys rather than with each other.
{ An example game.}
This is how to play "blink-murder".
There must be four or more players. One person is the "detective". The detective leaves the room and the others choose the "murderer". When the detective returns the murderer starts winking at people - who "die". Meanwhile the detective has up to three guesses to find out who the murderer is.
